EVENT   10
 PAGE   1
  If(1,1028,0,1,2)
   ShowMessageFace("",0,0,2,1)
   ShowMessage("The door is locked.")
   If(0,4,0)
    ShowMessageFace("alice_fc5",0,0,2,2)
    ShowMessage("\\n<Alice>This door is sealed by magic... Is this really a normal citizen's house?")
    ShowMessageFace("alice_fc5",0,0,2,3)
    ShowMessage("\\n<Alice>I am curious about this place. Let's see if we can get information about it in a tavern.")
    0()
   EndIf()
   If(0,5,0)
    ShowMessageFace("iriasu_fc4",2,0,2,4)
    ShowMessage("\\n<Ilias>The door appears to be sealed by powerful magic. It is not a house belonging to a normal citizen.")
    ShowMessageFace("iriasu_fc4",0,0,2,5)
    ShowMessage("\\n<Ilias>There is something suspicious about such a dwelling. The Goddess has a nose for such things. Perhaps someone in a tavern knows more about it.")
    0()
   EndIf()
   0()
  EndIf()
  If(1,1028,0,2,1)
   If(1,1086,0,0,0)
    If(2,"A",1)
     ChangeSelfSwitch("A",0)
     ShowMessageFace("",0,0,2,6)
     ShowMessage("The door is sealed by magic.")
     If(0,4,0)
      ShowMessageFace("alice_fc5",0,0,2,7)
      ShowMessage("\\n<Alice>The guard in the tavern said that this is Salaan's house. Since the door won't open normally, let's just forcefully break that seal.")
      0()
     EndIf()
     If(0,5,0)
      ShowMessageFace("iriasu_fc4",2,0,2,8)
      ShowMessage("\\n<Ilias>This must be Salaan's house. We shall dispel the magic seal.")
      0()
     EndIf()
